英文原版
Welcome to AutoCast, the best autobroadcasting plugin available on Spigot. AutoCast is has a user-friendly configuration to make your server look even better, this without deaccelerating the servers' performance. You can see it doesn't even show up in the timings ;)  AutoCast also comes with an easy to use API which makes the plugin even more useful for developers. Make sure to check out the bottom of the page to get more information about it.  Still not convinced? Make sure to read the complete plugin page, you could even join my discord server to receive some personal feedback.  Curious about how AutoCast is doing? Check out the bStats!
翻译
欢迎使用SpigotMC上极好的自动广播插件：Autocast（一下简称AC）。AC有一个极易操作的自定义设置来让你的服务器高大上，并且它不会拖慢你的服务器（对服务器的影响微乎其微）。AC还自带有易用的，方便于光大开发大佬们的API！
你还不信吗？往下看~




4be9631967c252c53d6b4ffc3c4214cbeea05210.png (8.05 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

英文原版
As stated before, the plugin is lightning fast which you could see from the timings, the plugin shouldn't be visible on the timings page, this because the plugin is not using the main thread to execute the broadcasts, it will use another thread, not used by the server, to make sure the message gets sent. This results a very lightweight plugin.Things like commands, and world/entity editing can't be done aSynchronously, those thing will be perfectly executed on the main thread, but still not use much performance.  Besided everything I mentioned above, it also makes your server look alot more professional. This because you can edit the plugin completely to your own likings, if you wish the plugin was completely yellow, you easily make the plugin yellow just by changing the messages.  You can also use PlaceHolderAPI in this plugin, which means you can add more information in your messages, PlaceHolderAPI will also work in the actionbar, title, bossbar, and book.  When you purchase AutoCast, you will automatically get my support, this means you can always contact me on my discord and receive almost immediate support when I'm available.
翻译
为什么选择我们？
1.不会拖慢服务器：它广播的机制不同于传统，这使它既轻量化又强大。
2.一切内容都可自由定制。
3.支持PAPI变量。

除了原文，作为一名腐竹，我发表一下这个插件的使用感受。
1.装插件前后，我的服务器TPS没有明显变化！！

2.动画每一帧可以自定义，动画的帧频也可以自己调整。
3.它可以取代服务器原本的信息格式，让你完全抛弃其他修改服务器原信息格式的插件！（如：自定义玩家加入信息）

命令与权限
/autocast[size=14.6667px] (简化: /ac)
[size=14.6667px]基础命令显示

/autocast reload
[size=14.6667px]重载插件
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.reload

/autocast[size=14.6667px] disable/enable
[size=14.6667px]自动广播开关
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.switchmode

/autocast create (message)
[size=14.6667px]创建空的广播
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.create

/autocast force[size=14.6667px] [size=14.6667px](message)
[size=14.6667px]强制发出一个广播（可以是随机的）
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.force

/autocast hide/show
[size=14.6667px]开启或关闭广播（仅自己可见）
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.hideandshow


/autocast order random/ordered
[size=14.6667px]更换广播顺序
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.order

/broadcast (message)[size=14.6667px] (Alias: /bc, /say)
/broadcast (title/actionbar/bossbar) message
[size=14.6667px]为所有人播报信息（通过以上方式）
[size=14.6667px]权限: autocast.broadcast
